data.name: Let It Boom
data.detailed_description:
VR-sandbox packed with fun destruction of the game environment in the alternative world.

You drive a magical van through an alternative world blowing up houses, bridges, and toilets, sending trains off the tracks and looking for piñatas holding treasures!

Here you will find:
  • Loads of cartoonish explosions in a vibrant alternative world.
  • Buildings and structures demolished in the most spectacular way.
  • Hilarious talking bomb.
  • A childish god with cat paws.
  • A train going over the bridge (well, you know what I mean...).
  • Demo world in the Wild West style.
  • A hippie van in the middle of the endless sea.

Jump into the craziest demolition sandbox in history!

data.short_description: VR-sandbox packed with fun destruction of buildings and structures in an alternative world. Drive a magic van through an alternative world, set off bombs, blow up buildings, structures, and trains! To save the universe from destruction - fight fire with fire!
